news.title: Gentoo Linux named as a finalist for Best Open Source Project

body.p: We're excited to announce that Gentoo Linux has been announced as a finalist for the Best Open Source project at LinuxWorld Conference and Expo's Product Excellence Awards. The other finalists include products from KDE, Sun Microsystems and RealNetworks. Final judging will take place on Wednesday, January 21st, with the winner being announced that afternoon. For those of you attending the expo, make sure to stop by and wish us luck!
